name: Win Condition
_source: s;Simon;We really did it...{w}{br}We killed the dragon.
s;Johannes;But you lot also seem like a tough bunch.{w}{br}While I could have done it alone,{w}{br}I was glad to fight alongside you.
s;Simon;But what will you do now?{w}{br}There aren't really any more dragons around, to my knowledge at least.
s;Johannes;Well, may I join your group then?{w}{br}You wander the land, eliminating threats to people's lives, right?
s;Simon;Uh, I guess you could say that.
s;Johannes;Well, that kind of life seems to have some appeal.{w}{br}One day, I hope to bring peace to these lands.
s;Simon;Sure, but force alone can't bring peace.{w}{br}We need some leadership, and a set of rules to preserve the peace.
s;Johannes;You sound like a noble all right...
s;Johannes;But look, that can be your job.{w}{br}My job will be slaying the foul beasts that plague the land.
s;Luther;Well done, milord.{w}{br}You truly proved yourself here today.
s;Luther;Dragons are fearsome foes, especially ones this ancient.{w}{br}With this fiend gone, the surrounding lands will be much safer.
s;Simon;We can only hope.{w}{br}With monsters and bandits controlling much of this land,{w}{br}this security is the kind of change we need.
s;Simon;Now, dragons are rumored to hoard treasure.{w}{br}Let's see what we can find...
